elements.name: guidelines
elements.html:
You have been assigned a mystery shop for the Google Home, worth $12!

Before heading to your mystery shop location, please thoroughly review the shop guidelines and watch the training video provided to learn about the product you are "shopping" for and to see the specific questions you will be asking.

If you need any assistance, please do not hesitate to text us at 650-753-5898

elements.name: email
elements.title: Please enter a valid email address

elements.name: storeopen
elements.title: Were you able to shop this location?

elements.name: storeclosed
elements.title: Please take a photo of the storefront, showing that it has permanently closed or has changed locations, and upload below:

elements.name: storefront
elements.title: Before entering the location, take a selfie of you in front of the store. Make sure you can see the retailer name in the photo.

elements.name: Persona
elements.title: Please select the persona you were assigned:

pages.name: Top of Mind Recommendation

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What was the first product the retail sales associate recommended?

pages.title: Enter the location and either wait to be greeted by a sales associate, or find and engage one yourself. Start the conversation with your assigned persona opener.

pages.name: Consideration Set

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What other products did the retail sales associate recommend you consider? [After you ask this question, only record up to the first two smart speakers the associate mentions in response]

pages.title: Ask the associate "What other options should I consider?"

pages.name: Personal Ownership

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What smart speaker did the retail sales associate say they own?

choices.text: Does not own a smart speaker

pages.title: Ask the associate, "Do you own a smart speaker yourself? If so, which one?"

pages.name: Personal Usage of Google Device

elements.name: question5
elements.title: When prompted, did the retail sales associate say they had tried out a Google Home?

elements.name: script5
elements.html: "Did you like using the Google Home?"

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Did the retail sales associate say they liked the Google Home?

elements.name: question5a
elements.title: When prompted, did the retail sales associate say they had heard of the Google Home?

pages.title: "My friend mentioned the new Google Home. Have you had a chance to try it yet?"

pages.name: Advantages of Google Home

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What did the retail sales associate mention as advantages of the Google Home compared to Amazon Echo? [Select all that apply]

choices.text: Breadth of smart home devices it can control (i.e streaming devices, smart light bulbs etc)
Diversity of daily tasks it can help with (i.e. setting alarms, making to-do lists, etc)
Sales associate was unsure/did not know any of the above features

elements.name: question7b
elements.title: What did the retail sales associate mention as advantages of Amazon Echo compared to the Google Home? [Select all that apply]

choices.text: Breadth of smart home devices it can control (i.e., streaming devices, smart light bulbs etc.)
Diversity of daily tasks it can help with (i.e., setting alarms, making to-do lists, etc.)
Sales associate was unsure/did not know any of the above features

pages.title: You will now ask the associate about Google Home advantages compared to Amazon Echo and Amazon Echo advantages compared to Google Home.

pages.name: Knowledge: Getting Started

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Did the retail sales associate explain how you get Google Home to listen to you?

choices.text: Yes - and explained the "Ok Google"  or "Hey Google" voice command for getting the Google Home's attention
The retail sales associate was unsure

pages.title: Ask, "How do I get Google Home to start listening to me?"

pages.name: Knowledge : Music

elements.name: question9
elements.title: What example music services did the retail sales associate mention you could control with Google home? [SELECT ALL THAT APPLY]

choices.text: The retail sales associate was unsure

pages.title: Ask, "What music services can I control using Google Home?"

pages.name: Knowledge: Answers from Google

elements.name: question10
elements.title: Did the retail sales associate explain that Google Home can tell you the weather?

choices.text: The retail sales associate was unsure

pages.title: Ask, "Can Google Home tell me the weather?"

pages.name: Knowledge : Everyday Tasks

elements.name: question11
elements.title: Did the retail sales associate mention how Google Home can help you manage your day? (Please select all that apply)

choices.text: Yes - and mentioned it can add calendar entries
Yes - and mentioned it can set an alarm
Yes - and mentioned it can set a timer
Yes - and mentioned it can retrieve flight details
Yes - and mentioned it can get traffic info
Yes - and mentioned it can provide weather reports
Yes - and mentioned it can retrieve nutrition information
The retail sales associate was unsure

pages.title: Say, "I've heard Google Home can help manage my day -- how?"

pages.name: Knowledge: Compatibility

elements.name: question12
elements.title: Did the retail sales associate mention that Google home is compatible with Chromecast?

choices.text: The retail sales associate was unsure

pages.title: Say, "I have a Chromecast at home -- does Google Home work with that too?"

elements.name: question13
elements.title: Please provide a 3-5 sentence summary of your experience:
